name: crush-grip
flavor_text: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this moveâ€™s power.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
effect_text_simple: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
